blog.title: KimYoonJeong
blog.description:
항상 나에게 폭풍 후 무지개가 되어 줘서 고맙습니다 김석진씨

Mom, Noona ARMY, Taejin biased

tags: and i believe that he didn’t know how hurtful it could be
i hope you're having a good day
body:
What Jimin said in 2014…

So it was brought to my attention that in the past Jimin said “깜둥이.”

That word is not the ‘n’ word, however, it is not used in a positive way either.

Mostly, people in Korea use it to describe a person of color in a negative way, and it is not okay.

I will say that Jimin said it in 2014, and people change and grow. My perspective on what happened is that he thought it made him sound more ‘hip hop’ and didn’t understand how that could hurt someone or the origin of it (was naive). People do dumb things when they are young to fit in, and I think this was an example of it. This doesn’t make it right, but I don’t think he meant it maliciously. Then again, I can’t say whether or not it was offensive, because I don’t have a deeper skin tone.

As a Korean, I feel my culture needs to become more exposed to other races and nationalities in order to make this word obsolete.

Just remember that everybody is beautiful and that we all can learn and grow to be better people.

I hope Koreans that have used/are using this word can change, embrace all walks of life, because it’s a big beautiful world out there.

Love to all of you ❤️

summary: Seokjin, Yoongi and Taehyung - You have a bit of facial hair Tears prickle your eyes as you come into the apartment that...
body:
Seokjin, Yoongi and Taehyung - You have a bit of facial hair

Tears prickle your eyes as you come into the apartment that evening. You’d been out with your friends, who still won’t leave you alone about the bits of hair on your face. They tease you and tell you that it makes you look more masculine, like you’re growing a beard, and you try to laugh it off but it hurts. That’s what you tell your boyfriend when he asks why you look so upset.

Jin

Jin slowly wraps his arms around your shoulders as you talk, letting you fall into his chest and just be held for a while. You stand there, just in the middle of the living room, for a while and quietly cry into his chest about everything that’s wrong with the situation. As you do that, Jin’s body slowly tenses itself, and he can feel his jaw clench involuntarily at the very though of anybody treating you like this,

“I made dinner, by the way. It’ll be ready to eat in 20 minutes,” Jin says absent mindedly, trying anything to distract himself from this news. He hates seeing you in pain, so the feeling of you sobbing into his chest like this is actually physically painful for him. Jin doesn’t get angry easily, but this is one of those rare times.

Yoongi

“Oh, don’t look at it! I can’t help it,” You fret, when Yoongi looks at you with utter disgust on his face. You cover the bottom half of your face with your hands and try to walk away, thoroughly ashamed that all you accomplished was bringing it to your boyfriend’s attention. The way he looked at you really hit a nerve, so tears are already streaming down your face when Yoongi catches your arm, tugging you back to face him,

“I know you can’t. And you should know that I don’t care about it. It’s your friends - if that’s what you’re calling them - who have the problem. So pull your hands away from your face and let me hug you so we can just relax or whatever,” Yoongi scolds, looking at you with just the slightest hint of a smile in his eyes.

Taehyung

“I don’t really see the big fuss,” Taehyung assures you, taking your chin in one of his hands and turning your face in the light. A slight frown in forming on his face, but that alleviates himself when his hand drops, and he leaves a quick kiss on your nose, loving how you scrunch it up involuntarily afterwards, “Seriously, everybody has hair on their face, it’s just that yours is a little darker. I wouldn’t put any faith in anybody’s opinions other than mine,” Taehyung finishes, his boxy smile presenting itself widely,

“Thanks, Tae,” You reply, wrapping your arms around his waist so that your head rests against his shoulder. You can feel his rhythmic breathing, and you find yourself matching yours to it as time passes, until you’re calm again, and you lose yourself to feeling of Taehyung’s hands rubbing soothingly up and down your back.

Masterlist

title: BTS - Reaction
body:
Anon: “Could you do a bts reaction to their baby falling asleep on them”

Of course I can! Here ya go love, hope you like it! (I gave genders to the babies so it would be easier to write, I hope you don’t mind) -Admin Sierra

Namjoon: He wouldn’t notice until you pointed it out. He was just simply doing something on his computer lightly rocking the baby in his arms. He looked down and smiled at how peaceful his little girl looked in his arms.

Yoongi: He would be holding his little boy who had bee crying for a while and when Yoongi took him in his arms he immediately stopped and started to doze off. Yoongi just stared at his small face, looking at every little detail. Seeing a little bit of both of you in him.

Taehyung: Humming as he slowly rocked his little girl on his chest in her nursery. He never felt more at peace. He loved the little noises she made when he would stop humming as a way of telling him to hum again. Which he did, she already had him wrapped around her tiny finger. He watched in awe as her tiny eyes fluttered shut gripping onto his finger in his free hand.

Hoseok: He wasn’t even paying much attention, He had him turned towards his computer while he did some last minute changes to his music. He went to move him and he made a fussing noise causing him to stop all movements.He used his front facing camera on his phone to see what he was doing and to his surprise he was out cold. He smiled at hoe peaceful he looked then proceeded to take a bunch of selfies and sent them all to you.

Jimin: All he wanted to do was get in some rehearsing while he was at home, but having a baby made that a bit difficult. He ended up having to hold her while he practiced, which to both of your surprise she loved. She was laughing and eating her hands as he moved around the living room. Not even a minute later she was asleep. He looked down at her sleeping form and rushed over to you so you could see. You both laughed quietly as he snuggled her closer to him.

Jungkook: He had a game controller in one hand and his baby in the other. Softly humming and bouncing him on his knee. You where busy putting the laundry away so he took over taking care of the baby. He finished the round on his game and decided to turn it off. He noticed he dropped his toy so he went to pick it up, noticing he had fallen asleep, so he leaned back on the couch and brought him to his chest and fell asleep also.

Jin: Recording at the studio with a fussy baby was hard but he managed. When she would fuss for him he held her while he sang. He heard awes coming from the staff and looked at them confused so they pointed to the baby. He looked down to see her fast asleep gripping his finger. Drool forming on his arm. He smiled and wiped the drool away and finished his recordings and napped with her on the sofa.

( I DON’T OWN THESE BEAUTIFUL GIFS )

title: aplistia
body:

by solarchild

“You did not need to stall that one, Wolf.” Taehyung complains. He looks around for stray pieces of wood to light a fire with. He removes the mask from his face and it disappears into thin air.

“It stinks so bad… to think it even lied in the face of end.” Jimin hesitates a bit at the smell of the soul, but it’s his to take. Lamb doesn’t require the souls of the living, he feeds off on emotions. The deeper and sincerer the better.

Or, in which where Lamb will go, Wolf will be sure to follow.

(**inspired by the story of the kindred from the game: League of Legends)

“It stinks so bad… to think it even lied in the face of end.” Jimin hesitates a bit at the smell of the soul, but it’s his to take. Lamb doesn’t require the souls of the living, he feeds off on emotions. The deeper and sincerer the better.

Or, in which where Lamb will go, Wolf will be sure to follow.

title: Instant Love | Chapter 10 | Y/N’s POV
body:
Genre: College!AU, Fluff, Angst

Pairing: Nerd!Namjoon x Foreign!Female!Reader ; Mentions of Yoonseok & Jikook ; Bestie!Taehyung x Bestie!Lavender(OC)

Summary: Y/N is a foreign English speaking student who has gone to Seoul for college. She’s starting her third semester there and is headed towards her Zoology degree. Namjoon is a business student working a bunch of boring classes and jobs. He gets paired up with a freshman named Taehyung, whom he has no interest in conversing with, until he gets invited to a dance studio, where he meets Y/N, the girl he’s been crushing on for a year. He’s never talked to her, but he follows her Instagram and she follows his. They have talked through comments, and like each other’s pictures, but what happens when they are forced to converse face to face?

Warning: Mentions of Fighting, Blood, Anxiety; Read with caution <3

Word Count: 1,041

Chapter 1 // Chapter 2 // Chapter 3 // Chapter 4 // Chapter 5 // Chapter 6 // Chapter 7 // Chapter 8 // Chapter 9 // Chapter 11 // Chapter 12 [FINAL] //

Author’s Note: Welcome to Chapter 10! Please let me know what you think of this chapter, I love getting feedback! I hope you enjoyed it!!! ^_^

           I walked into my dorm room, a deep sigh coming from my mouth. I just got into a huge fight with Jack, and I felt sick. He had become so aggressive, it was toxic. I’m blessed to have been raised but such a strong mother, I was able to end it and not look back. I took a moment to open Instagram, scrolling through and landing on Jin’s post.

           I gave a small smile, feeling my nerves relax a little. He looked happy… happier than I’ve seen him in days. Lavender’s eyes landed on me as I walked deeper into the room.

           “Y/N? You look sick!” Lavender said, standing up and placing her hands on my arms. I winced, making her wide eyed and immediately take them off.

           “Lavie, I’m fine. Just bruised,” I replied, lifting my sleeves to show bruised handprints.

           “Y/N, oh my god,” She said, bug eyed.

           “Lavender, I’m okay,” I said, giving a small smile. “It’s over, I’m done.”

           “This is all my fault, I shouldn’t have pushed you,” She whispered, frowning.

           “Lavender, do not blame yourself,” I whispered, eyeing her. “Please, it’s fine. I got to go to practice.”

           “Want me to come?” She asked, tears threatening to spill. I nodded, giving a small smile.

           “I’d love you to. You can help me control the boys when I tell them,” I replied, getting changed into workout clothes.


           “He what!” Hoseok shouted, eyes wide with anger.

           “Hobi,” I warned, but Taehyung cut me off.

           “I’ll kill him,” He growled, about to leave, but I hugged him, heart racing.

           “Tae, please, stop,” I begged, squeezing my eyes shut.

           “Why? He hurt you!” Jimin asked, a growl in his voice.

           “But, she ended it,” Yoongi said, making me pull away from Tae and look at him. “Listen, I’m as upset as you guys with what he did, but he’s done for. Y/N ended it, period.”

           “Yoongi’s right,” Jungkook said, furrowing his brow. Before any of us could respond, Jin ran in, breathing heavy.

           “Guys, Namjoon’s missing,” He said.

           “What?” I asked, wide eyed.

           “He said he was going to see you. He’s not answering his phone or anything,” Jin said, wide eyed.

           “Oh god, we gotta go,” I said, running out the door with the others close behind.


           We decided to split up to look, going in pairs. Jungkook was with me as we walked around the darkness of campus. My heart was racing, and I knew Jack had something to do with it. I squinted my eyes, anger raging through me as I remembered our fight.

           “What’re you thinking?” Jungkook asked, eyeing me.

           “How horrible he is,” I replied. “Jack, I mean. We got in an argument about Namjoon.”

           “And?” He asked.

           “He was very… racist? Towards Koreans. It didn’t make any sense,” I replied, sighing. “He lives in Korea, barely knows the language, and was criticizing me for even talking to Namjoon.”

           “Fuck him,” Jungkook said, angry. “Foreigners like that are common.”

           “They ruin it for the rest of us,” I mumbled.

           There was a grunt as we passed an alleyway, and down it we saw four men surrounding a body on the ground, kicking it. I gasped, making them turn to face us. One was Jack, and it clicked who was on the ground.

           “Get away from him!” Jungkook yelled, running down the alleyway, me close behind him.

           He punched the first guy, the other two coming up on him. I jumped onto Jack’s back, biting into his neck and tugging at his hair. He shouted in pain, slamming me into the wall, making me huff in response and limp down.

           “Y/N,” Namjoon choked out, making me look at him.

           “Hold on, Joonie. I need to help Kookie,” I said, standing up.

           Two of the guys were holding him while the third punched him in the stomach. Jack was protecting them as I growled., glaring hard. I kicked my foot, landing in between his legs, making him fall to his knees. I took his head, slamming it to me knee. He fell back, groaning in pain.

           I took the chance to get onto the back of the man punching Jungkook, wrapping my arms tight around his neck, choking him. He stumbled back, giving Jungkook time to rip out of ones grip, slamming a fist to the other. One ran away, leaving Jungkook with only one attacker.

           The one I was on slammed me against a wall, knocking the breath away once more. I fell next to Namjoon again, but this time, my attacker punched me, making me dizzy. I heard Jungkook yell my name, but Jack’s face appeared in front of me.

           “Stupid bitch,” He growled.

           I felt his fingers wrap around my neck, making me automatically bring my hands to his wrists. My oxygen was cut off, and I was gasping. Namjoon was desperately trying to reach me, but he was far too weak, while Jungkook had two attackers.

           Think, Y/N, think. What did my mom teach me…? I could feel myself loosing consciousness, a panic settling deep in my bones. I had to think of something to do, and fast, or I would die. That’s when it hit me…. The eyes… Mom always said to go for the eyes.

           I reached my thumbs up, settling them against Jack’s eyes and pushing in as hard as I could. I listened Jack scream in pain, his arms going away to cover his hurt eyes. I began to cough, air filling my lungs fast, making me light headed.

           I listened to the sirens coming; the first word coming to mind was finally…. My hand went to my tender throat as I listened to Jack scream. Feet hit the pavement, the other two attackers running the other way to escape. Jungkook came over, kicking Jack in the head, making him pass out.

           I weakly went to Namjoon, holding his face and finally getting a good look at him. His entire face was bruised and bloody, and I didn’t even have to look to know the bruises covered his entire body. I sighed in relief, seeing him move a little.

           “You’ll be okay, police are coming. It’ll be okay,” I whispered, watching him close his eyes and pass out.

           I walked into my dorm room, a deep sigh coming from my mouth. I just got into a huge fight with Jack, and I felt sick. He had become so aggressive, it was toxic. I’m blessed to have been raised but such a strong mother, I was able to end it and not look back. I took a moment to open Instagram, scrolling through and landing on Jin’s post.

           I gave a small smile, feeling my nerves relax a little. He looked happy… happier than I’ve seen him in days. Lavender’s eyes landed on me as I walked deeper into the room.

           “Y/N? You look sick!” Lavender said, standing up and placing her hands on my arms. I winced, making her wide eyed and immediately take them off.

           “Lavie, I’m fine. Just bruised,” I replied, lifting my sleeves to show bruised handprints.

           “Y/N, oh my god,” She said, bug eyed.

           “Lavender, I’m okay,” I said, giving a small smile. “It’s over, I’m done.”

           “This is all my fault, I shouldn’t have pushed you,” She whispered, frowning.

           “Lavender, do not blame yourself,” I whispered, eyeing her. “Please, it’s fine. I got to go to practice.”

           “Want me to come?” She asked, tears threatening to spill. I nodded, giving a small smile.

           “I’d love you to. You can help me control the boys when I tell them,” I replied, getting changed into workout clothes.


           “He what!” Hoseok shouted, eyes wide with anger.

           “Hobi,” I warned, but Taehyung cut me off.

           “I’ll kill him,” He growled, about to leave, but I hugged him, heart racing.

           “Tae, please, stop,” I begged, squeezing my eyes shut.

           “Why? He hurt you!” Jimin asked, a growl in his voice.

           “But, she ended it,” Yoongi said, making me pull away from Tae and look at him. “Listen, I’m as upset as you guys with what he did, but he’s done for. Y/N ended it, period.”

           “Yoongi’s right,” Jungkook said, furrowing his brow. Before any of us could respond, Jin ran in, breathing heavy.

           “Guys, Namjoon’s missing,” He said.

           “What?” I asked, wide eyed.

           “He said he was going to see you. He’s not answering his phone or anything,” Jin said, wide eyed.

           “Oh god, we gotta go,” I said, running out the door with the others close behind.


           We decided to split up to look, going in pairs. Jungkook was with me as we walked around the darkness of campus. My heart was racing, and I knew Jack had something to do with it. I squinted my eyes, anger raging through me as I remembered our fight.

           “What’re you thinking?” Jungkook asked, eyeing me.

           “How horrible he is,” I replied. “Jack, I mean. We got in an argument about Namjoon.”

           “And?” He asked.

           “He was very… racist? Towards Koreans. It didn’t make any sense,” I replied, sighing. “He lives in Korea, barely knows the language, and was criticizing me for even talking to Namjoon.”

           “Fuck him,” Jungkook said, angry. “Foreigners like that are common.”

           “They ruin it for the rest of us,” I mumbled.

           There was a grunt as we passed an alleyway, and down it we saw four men surrounding a body on the ground, kicking it. I gasped, making them turn to face us. One was Jack, and it clicked who was on the ground.

           “Get away from him!” Jungkook yelled, running down the alleyway, me close behind him.

           He punched the first guy, the other two coming up on him. I jumped onto Jack’s back, biting into his neck and tugging at his hair. He shouted in pain, slamming me into the wall, making me huff in response and limp down.

           “Y/N,” Namjoon choked out, making me look at him.

           “Hold on, Joonie. I need to help Kookie,” I said, standing up.

           Two of the guys were holding him while the third punched him in the stomach. Jack was protecting them as I growled., glaring hard. I kicked my foot, landing in between his legs, making him fall to his knees. I took his head, slamming it to me knee. He fell back, groaning in pain.

           I took the chance to get onto the back of the man punching Jungkook, wrapping my arms tight around his neck, choking him. He stumbled back, giving Jungkook time to rip out of ones grip, slamming a fist to the other. One ran away, leaving Jungkook with only one attacker.

           The one I was on slammed me against a wall, knocking the breath away once more. I fell next to Namjoon again, but this time, my attacker punched me, making me dizzy. I heard Jungkook yell my name, but Jack’s face appeared in front of me.

           “Stupid bitch,” He growled.

           I felt his fingers wrap around my neck, making me automatically bring my hands to his wrists. My oxygen was cut off, and I was gasping. Namjoon was desperately trying to reach me, but he was far too weak, while Jungkook had two attackers.

           Think, Y/N, think. What did my mom teach me…? I could feel myself loosing consciousness, a panic settling deep in my bones. I had to think of something to do, and fast, or I would die. That’s when it hit me…. The eyes… Mom always said to go for the eyes.

           I reached my thumbs up, settling them against Jack’s eyes and pushing in as hard as I could. I listened Jack scream in pain, his arms going away to cover his hurt eyes. I began to cough, air filling my lungs fast, making me light headed.

           I listened to the sirens coming; the first word coming to mind was finally…. My hand went to my tender throat as I listened to Jack scream. Feet hit the pavement, the other two attackers running the other way to escape. Jungkook came over, kicking Jack in the head, making him pass out.

           I weakly went to Namjoon, holding his face and finally getting a good look at him. His entire face was bruised and bloody, and I didn’t even have to look to know the bruises covered his entire body. I sighed in relief, seeing him move a little.

           “You’ll be okay, police are coming. It’ll be okay,” I whispered, watching him close his eyes and pass out.
trail.content_abstract:
Genre: College!AU, Fluff, Angst

Pairing: Nerd!Namjoon x Foreign!Female!Reader ; Mentions of Yoonseok & Jikook ; Bestie!Taehyung x Bestie!Lavender(OC)

Summary: Y/N is a foreign English speaking student who has gone to Seoul for college. She’s starting her third semester there and is headed towards her Zoology degree. Namjoon is a business student working a bunch of boring classes and jobs. He gets paired up with a freshman named Taehyung, whom he has no interest in conversing with, until he gets invited to a dance studio, where he meets Y/N, the girl he’s been crushing on for a year. He’s never talked to her, but he follows her Instagram and she follows his. They have talked through comments, and like each other’s pictures, but what happens when they are forced to converse face to face?

Warning: Mentions of Fighting, Blood, Anxiety; Read with caution <3
